definitions.definition: Inclined to adventure ; willing to take risks ; prone to embark on hazardous enterprises; daring .
Full of risks ; risky ; liable to be in danger; requiring courage; rash.

main_definition: ( of a person ) Inclined to adventure ; willing to take risks ; prone to embark on hazardous enterprises; daring .
secondary_definitions: ( of an act or product ) Full of risks ; risky ; liable to be in danger; requiring courage; rash.
